userStories.title: Add collapse state management
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to add state management for tracking which sidebar sections are expanded so that the collapse functionality has a foundation to work from.
acceptanceCriteria: State tracks which sections are expanded (array or object)
State defaults all sections to collapsed
State can be toggled for individual sections

userStories.title: Add chevron toggle icons to section headers
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a chevron icon on each sidebar section header so that I can visually identify collapsible sections and their current state.
acceptanceCriteria: Each section header displays a chevron icon
Chevron points right when collapsed
Chevron points down when expanded
Chevron has appropriate hover state

userStories.title: Implement expand/collapse toggle on chevron click
userStories.description: As a user, I want to click the chevron icon to expand or collapse a sidebar section so that I can manage which navigation items are visible.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking chevron toggles section expanded/collapsed state
Section items are immediately shown/hidden (no animation)
Collapsed sections show only header with chevron
Expanded sections show header plus all child navigation items

userStories.title: Persist collapse state to localStorage
userStories.description: As a user, I want my expanded/collapsed section preferences to persist across page loads so that I don't have to re-expand sections every time I visit.
acceptanceCriteria: Expanded/collapsed state is saved to localStorage with key 'sidebar-collapsed-sections'
On page load, state is restored from localStorage
If no stored state exists, all sections default to collapsed

userStories.title: Section title navigates independently of collapse
userStories.description: As a user, I want clicking the section title text to navigate to the section's first item so that the title and chevron have separate behaviors.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking section title text navigates to first item in section
Clicking section title does NOT toggle collapse state
Chevron click remains the only way to toggle collapse

userStories.title: Install and configure Playwright
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Playwright installed and configured so that I can write E2E tests for the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Playwright is installed as a dev dependency
playwright.config.ts is created with appropriate settings
Chromium browser is configured for testing
Base URL points to local dev server

userStories.title: Add Playwright npm scripts and test directory
userStories.description: As a developer, I want npm scripts for running Playwright tests so that tests can be easily executed.
acceptanceCriteria: tests/ directory is created at project root
package.json has 'test:e2e' script for running Playwright
package.json has 'test:e2e:ui' script for Playwright UI mode
.gitignore updated to ignore Playwright artifacts

userStories.title: Playwright test: Default collapsed state
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Playwright test verifying all sections are collapsed on initial page load so that the default behavior is validated.
acceptanceCriteria: Test navigates to a page with sidebar
Test clears localStorage before checking
Test verifies all section items are hidden
Test verifies all chevrons point right (collapsed)

userStories.title: Playwright test: Expand and collapse sections
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Playwright tests verifying expand/collapse functionality so that toggle behavior is validated.
acceptanceCriteria: Test clicking chevron expands section and shows items
Test clicking chevron again collapses section and hides items
Test verifies chevron rotation changes with state

userStories.title: Playwright test: Multiple sections independent behavior
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Playwright test verifying multiple sections can be expanded simultaneously so that independent behavior is validated.
acceptanceCriteria: Test expands multiple sections
Test verifies all expanded sections show their items
Test verifies collapsing one section doesn't affect others

userStories.title: Playwright test: LocalStorage persistence
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Playwright test verifying state persists across page reloads so that localStorage functionality is validated.
acceptanceCriteria: Test expands a section
Test reloads the page
Test verifies the section remains expanded after reload

userStories.title: Playwright test: Section title navigation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Playwright test verifying section title clicks navigate without toggling collapse so that title behavior is validated.
acceptanceCriteria: Test clicks section title (not chevron)
Test verifies navigation occurs
Test verifies collapse state is unchanged
